Files

minijinja/vm/
loop_object.rs

1use std::fmt;
2use std::sync::atomic::{AtomicUsize, Ordering};
3use std::sync::{Arc, Mutex};
4
5use crate::error::{Error, ErrorKind};
6use crate::value::{Enumerator, Object, Value};
7use crate::vm::state::State;
8
9pub(crate) struct Loop {
10    pub len: Option<usize>,
11    pub idx: AtomicUsize,
12    pub depth: usize,
13    #[cfg(feature = "adjacent_loop_items")]
14    pub value_triple: Mutex<(Option<Value>, Option<Value>, Option<Value>)>,
15    pub last_changed_value: Mutex<Option<Vec<Value>>>,
16}
17
18impl fmt::Debug for Loop {
19    fn fmt(&self, f: &mut fmt::Formatter<'_>) -> fmt::Result {
20        f.debug_struct("Loop")
21            .field("len", &self.len)
22            .field("idx", &self.idx)
23            .field("depth", &self.depth)
24            .finish()
25    }
26}
27
28impl Object for Loop {
29    fn call(self: &Arc<Self>, _state: &State, _args: &[Value]) -> Result<Value, Error> {
30        Err(Error::new(
31            ErrorKind::InvalidOperation,
32            "loop cannot be called if reassigned to different variable",
33        ))
34    }
35
36    fn call_method(
37        self: &Arc<Self>,
38        _state: &State,
39        name: &str,
40        args: &[Value],
41    ) -> Result<Value, Error> {
42        if name == "changed" {
43            let mut last_changed_value = self.last_changed_value.lock().unwrap();
44            let value = args.to_owned();
45            let changed = last_changed_value.as_ref() != Some(&value);
46            if changed {
47                *last_changed_value = Some(value);
48                Ok(Value::from(true))
49            } else {
50                Ok(Value::from(false))
51            }
52        } else if name == "cycle" {
53            let idx = self.idx.load(Ordering::Relaxed);
54            match args.get(idx % args.len()) {
55                Some(arg) => Ok(arg.clone()),
56                None => Ok(Value::UNDEFINED),
57            }
58        } else {
59            Err(Error::from(ErrorKind::UnknownMethod))
60        }
61    }
62
63    fn enumerate(self: &Arc<Self>) -> Enumerator {
64        Enumerator::Str(&[
65            "index0",
66            "index",
67            "length",
68            "revindex",
69            "revindex0",
70            "first",
71            "last",
72            "depth",
73            "depth0",
74            #[cfg(feature = "adjacent_loop_items")]
75            "previtem",
76            #[cfg(feature = "adjacent_loop_items")]
77            "nextitem",
78        ])
79    }
80
81    fn get_value(self: &Arc<Self>, key: &Value) -> Option<Value> {
82        let key = some!(key.as_str());
83        let idx = self.idx.load(Ordering::Relaxed) as u64;
84        // if we never iterated, then all attributes are undefined.
85        // this can happen in some rare circumstances where the engine
86        // did not manage to iterate
87        if idx == !0 {
88            return Some(Value::UNDEFINED);
89        }
90        let len = self.len.map(|x| x as u64);
91        match key {
92            "index0" => Some(Value::from(idx)),
93            "index" => Some(Value::from(idx + 1)),
94            "length" => Some(len.map(Value::from).unwrap_or(Value::UNDEFINED)),
95            "revindex" => Some(
96                len.map(|len| Value::from(len.saturating_sub(idx)))
97                    .unwrap_or(Value::UNDEFINED),
98            ),
99            "revindex0" => Some(
100                len.map(|len| Value::from(len.saturating_sub(idx).saturating_sub(1)))
101                    .unwrap_or(Value::UNDEFINED),
102            ),
103            "first" => Some(Value::from(idx == 0)),
104            "last" => Some(len.map_or(Value::from(false), |len| {
105                Value::from(len == 0 || idx == len - 1)
106            })),
107            "depth" => Some(Value::from(self.depth + 1)),
108            "depth0" => Some(Value::from(self.depth)),
109            #[cfg(feature = "adjacent_loop_items")]
110            "previtem" => Some(
111                self.value_triple
112                    .lock()
113                    .unwrap()
114                    .0
115                    .clone()
116                    .unwrap_or(Value::UNDEFINED),
117            ),
118            #[cfg(feature = "adjacent_loop_items")]
119            "nextitem" => Some(
120                self.value_triple
121                    .lock()
122                    .unwrap()
123                    .2
124                    .clone()
125                    .unwrap_or(Value::UNDEFINED),
126            ),
127            _ => None,
128        }
129    }
130
131    fn render(self: &Arc<Self>, f: &mut fmt::Formatter<'_>) -> fmt::Result {
132        write!(
133            f,
134            "<loop {}/{}>",
135            self.idx.load(Ordering::Relaxed),
136            match self.len {
137                Some(ref len) => len as &dyn fmt::Display,
138                None => &"?" as &dyn fmt::Display,
139            },
140        )
141    }
142}
